## Summary
Describe what this PR changes and why.

## PR title
- [ ] PR title follows conventional format (e.g., `feat:`, `fix:`, `docs:`, `perf:`, `refactor:`, `test:`, `ci:`, `chore:`)

## Type of change
- [ ] Bug fix
- [ ] New feature
- [ ] Documentation update
- [ ] Performance improvement

## Validation
- [ ] `go test ./...`
- [ ] `go test -race ./...`
- [ ] `go vet ./...`

## Checklist
